* Welcome page - http://www.sfml-dev.org/index-fr.php

= API

* API 1.6 - http://www.sfml-dev.org/documentation/1.6-fr/
* API 2.0 - http://www.sfml-dev.org/documentation/2.0-fr/
* API 2.1 - http://www.sfml-dev.org/documentation/2.1-fr/ <= current
* API 2.2 - http://www.sfml-dev.org/documentation/2.2-fr/

* SFML 1.6 - http://www.sfml-dev.org/tutorials/1.6/index-fr.php

* SFML 2.2 - http://www.sfml-dev.org/tutorials/2.2/index-fr.php
